subject: Hi dear. My order number is SSN5787
description_text:
I just wonder why it take so long to ship my order . Are they out of stock ? Thankyou!
Sent from Van ,

conversations.body_text: Hi van tran,  Due to demand far exceeding expectations, this item has been out of stock for nearly two weeks. We will arrange shipment within the next two days and sincerely apologize for the delay.

Do you have them in stock now?
Sent from Van ,

>
